Amielle Dulay
about posts

Hi! I'm Amielle.

I'm an AI/ML enthusiast with an undergraduate degree in Computer Engineering. In my free time, I like to learn by experimenting with code (using Python and occasionally C/C++). Specific things that currently pique my interest include NLP, finance, and privatized learning. Reading fiction, playing games, and making art are things I also enjoy doing.

I believe that one can never stop learning, so this blog will contain tidbits of the things I learn along the way, fixes on the things I debug, and overall a progress of growth in terms of gaining knowledge and applying these concepts to (hopefully) help others as well.
